knimeNode.name: R Snippet
knimeNode.shortDescription: A generic R scripting node that takes an R workspace input and returns the altered R workspace as output

fullDescription.intro:
A generic R scripting node that takes an R workspace input and returns the altered R workspace as output.
Make sure that Rserve is running somewhere, and KNIME is accordingly configured (KNIME->Preferences).
Detailed documentation about the R generic nodes:
Wiki on GitHub: knime-scripting
